ygData.subject: Re: Level 29 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Both of these spells are available in Ak anon (Confirmed) It s in my spell list.  Please help with the updates. I have a major board willing to post the
ygData.messageBody:
Shadowwalker wrote:

> Does anyone know where the level 29 DD spells Inferno Shock and
> Thunder Strike can be located? -Shadowwalker of Karana

Both of these spells are available in Ak'anon (Confirmed) It's in my
spell list. Please help with the updates. I have a major board willing
to post the list and if I can get enough response, I will be sure to
credit our group for the list. If you need a copy, feel free to E-mail
me at my personal address.

Cheers
Malkin Fennin Ro
